seasonCycle.description: RAPPworld operates on a 4-week seasonal cycle, repeating throughout the year

week1.name: Dawn Season
week1.narrative: A time of fresh starts and new possibilities. The world welcomes new adventurers and celebrates renewal.

week2.name: Tournament Season
week2.narrative: Champions rise and fall in the arena. Glory awaits those with courage and skill.

week3.name: Trade Season
week3.narrative: Merchants gather, deals are struck, and fortunes are made. The marketplace thrives.

week4.name: Lore Season
week4.narrative: Secrets emerge from shadow. Those who seek shall find, and knowledge becomes power.

yearlySeasons.name: Season of the Dawn
yearlySeasons.subtitle: The Age of New Beginnings
yearlySeasons.major_story: The world awakens and heroes emerge

yearlySeasons.name: Season of Storms
yearlySeasons.subtitle: Trials by Tempest
yearlySeasons.major_story: Great challenges test the heroes' resolve

yearlySeasons.name: Season of Flames
yearlySeasons.subtitle: Forge of Champions
yearlySeasons.major_story: Heroes are forged in the crucible of conflict

yearlySeasons.name: Season of Tides
yearlySeasons.subtitle: Currents of Change
yearlySeasons.major_story: The world shifts and new powers emerge

yearlySeasons.name: Season of Stars
yearlySeasons.subtitle: Celestial Convergence
yearlySeasons.major_story: The stars align and destinies are revealed

yearlySeasons.name: Season of Earth
yearlySeasons.subtitle: Foundations of Power
yearlySeasons.major_story: Ancient powers of the earth awaken

yearlySeasons.name: Season of Winds
yearlySeasons.subtitle: Whispers of Change
yearlySeasons.major_story: Messages from afar bring new opportunities

yearlySeasons.name: Season of Harvest
yearlySeasons.subtitle: Reaping What Was Sown
yearlySeasons.major_story: The fruits of past labors come to bear

yearlySeasons.name: Season of Unity
yearlySeasons.subtitle: Bonds Unbreakable
yearlySeasons.major_story: Heroes unite against the coming darkness

yearlySeasons.name: Season of Legends
yearlySeasons.subtitle: The Grand Finale
yearlySeasons.major_story: The year's story reaches its epic conclusion

transitionEvents.description: Special events that occur during season transitions

cycleModifiers.description: Special modifiers that can affect entire seasons
